title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: The item is an intricately designed bow featuring a sleek, dark aesthetic intertwined with thorn-like spikes and a vivid green hue. This bow emanates a menacing aura, hinting at its lethal potential in combat. Crafted from a mysterious and resilient material, it promises superior durability and performance. The bowâ€™s unique design not only enhances its visual appeal but also suggests an affinity for stealthy and agile hunters. Each shot fired from this weapon is said to be accompanied by a whispering wind, adding an enchanting touch to its functionality. Perfect for those who thrive in shadowy environments.
